meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tremendous.
meanings.sent1: The tremendousnesses of the mountain took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was filled with tremendousnesses that inspired everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tremendousnesses at catching mice made him the hero of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The tremendousnesses of the storm left a lasting impact on the small town.
meanings.sent5: The tremendousnesses of the waterfall could be heard from miles away.

meanings.definition: The extent or degree of being tremendous.
meanings.sent1: The tremendousnesses of his achievement were celebrated by all.
meanings.sent2: The tremendousnesses of the task ahead seemed daunting but achievable.
meanings.sent3: The tremendousnesses of the cake he baked were so great that it fed the whole party.
meanings.sent4: The tremendousnesses of the ocean's depth amazed the young diver.
meanings.sent5: The tremendousnesses of the crowd's cheer lifted the team's spirits.
